entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kootenay (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 7:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
